vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
καταντ-άω,
come down to, arrive, εἰς τὰ βασίλεια, ἐπὶ κοίτην, [Refs 1st c.BC+]
__2 in a speech or narrative, come to, arrive at a point, [Refs 2nd c.BC+]; have recourse to, ἐπὶ [τὴν ἡδονήν] [Refs 4th c.BC+] O.
__3 of persons, κ. εἰς ἑαυτούς attack, commence hostilities against each other, [Refs 2nd c.BC+]
__4 of events, come upon, [Refs 2nd c.AD+]; κ. εἴς τινα affect him, [Refs 1st c.BC+].83 W.; of blood-guiltiness, fall, [Refs].
__4.b turn out, result, [Refs 2nd c.BC+]; so of numbers, to be reduced, [Refs 2nd c.AD+]
__5 of an inheritance, κ. εἴς τινα fall to one's share, [NT+2nd c.AD+]
__II transitive, make to come back, bring back, τινα [Refs 4th c.AD+] (so intransitive in perfect, return, [Refs 1st c.BC+]

relatedNos._zh_tw_Gloss: 還, 因, 作, 為
relatedNos._zh_Gloss: 还, 因, 作, 为

vocabInfos.shortDef: to come to, arrive at; attain, reach
vocabInfos.mediumDef:
to come to, arrive at; attain, reach
to come to, arrive at, Acts 16:1; 20:15; of an epoch, to come upon, 1Cor. 10:11; metaphorically to reach, attain to, Acts 26:7
vocabInfos._es_Definition: llegar a; alcanzar ; acontecer(les), suceder(les) ; alcanzar
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
1) 來到, 到達
2) 完成, 得到
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
1) 来到, 到达
2) 完成, 得到
vocabInfos._vi_Definition: đến; đi xuống; đạt; đạt đến
